data.title: Hentai Games – Page 70 – Hentaifromhell
data.text:
Category Archives: Hentai Games

[VN] [Unity] [KanashiiPanda] Book of Lust [v0.1.20.1c ]

Release Date: 2024-07-01

Developer: KanashiiPanda SubscribeStar – Patreon

Censored: No

Version: 0.1.20.1c

OS: Windows, Mac & Linux

Language: English

Overview:

You play as a guy who accidentally releases a succubus (with a bit of a catch) and gets access to both her spell book and herself​

v0.1.20.1c

-Fixed duplicating character sprites during dialogue on occasion which could cause slow downs when skipping through dialogue.

-Fixed Katherine’s dialogue box not working properly during her dorm room visit

v0.1.20.1b

-Fixed UI not disappearing when using ‘sex’ option.

-Fixed Jake “helping mom” not triggering.

-Fixed one of Mel’s pictures not appearing properly in Olivia’s Soul Passenger.

v0.1.20.1a

-Added Dom Mind with Olivia while playing as Jake at Late Night while she’s “dating” Mel.

-Added Olivia’s Soul Passenger scenario in which she can call Mel to have sex with her at the flowershop during lunch.

-Added on to Chapter 2’s story.

-Added Katherine Nguyen as a character.

-Added Katherine Nguyen’s room.

-Lined and Colored a few more pictures of the Raven Mother festival scene.

-Removed some unnecesary lines in the Raven Mother Festival scene.

Win: GOFILE – KRAKENFILES – MEGA – MIXDROP – YOURFILESTORE

Mac: GOFILE – KRAKENFILES – MEGA – MIXDROP – YOURFILESTORE

Linux: GOFILE – KRAKENFILES – MEGA – MIXDROP – YOURFILESTORE

[VN] [Ren’Py] [4MinuteWarning] Ravager [v5.1.9]

Release Date: 2024-07-06

Developer: 4MinuteWarning Patreon – SubscribeStar – Itch.io – Discord – Hentai Foundry

Censored: No

Version: 5.1.9

OS: Windows, Linux, Mac, Android

Language: English

Overview:

We all know the story: Hero emerges from humble beginnings, slays the tyrannical dragon, and ushers in a new era of peace and prosperity. But here, it’s the other way around. Ravager is a game where you play a young dragon, determined to reclaim their birthright. To do so, you will need to build your power, ally with dark forces, evade justice, and whet your bestial appetites. The game currently spans the first four acts of the story: from your birth to your assault on the capital. It has a nonlinear plot, with many significant choices to make (and fun to have) along the way.​

Dev Notes

It is traditional, in the wake of a major update, for us to release a bonus patch build as feedback comes in. And who am I to argue with tradition? Thank you to everyone who reported the various bugs and eccentricities in v440.

A more substantive, media-focused update will follow later this month.

MVP of this build is Tosk, who is to credit for all these fixes.

v5.1.9:

Act V Features

Plot: A possible dream(?) at the end of Chapter One (collab with Mattrex).

Dynamic: The developer interview at the end of the game has been restored and extended.

Art: Eburon’s oral scene in the manor ruins (four images, Lubbio).

Art: Remastered art for Naho’s pregnant anal scenes in the dungeon (two scenes, eighteen images, Lubbio).

Art: Remastered art for Naho’s pregnant doggy-style scenes in the dungeon (two scenes, eight images, Lubbio).

Art: A new sprite and set of emotes for Marie-Anne (two variants, twenty-two images, Irrelevant Art).

Art: Remastered sprites for pregnant Naho (two variants, Irrelevant Art).

Animation: Updated idles for nude Chia (seven animations, Amon Ra).

Animation: Animated idles for pregnant Enid with torn clothes (ten animations, Amon Ra).

Animation: Updated idles for pregnant Inej (eight animations, Amon Ra).

Animation: Animated idles for Marie-Anne’s new appearance (two variants, twenty-four animations, Amon Ra).

Voice: Chia’s conversation about Adeline, if the princess is gone (Marina Montague).

Voice: Darja’s guided tour of the palace (Nyah).

Voice: The hunt for Darja, and consequent discussion, if she’s not where she’s supposed to be (Nyah).

Voice: Enid’s post-boink reflections in the storerooms (Demi Goggles).

Voice: The omen’s mother reacts to her offspring’s condition being celebrated (Demi Goggles).

Gallery: Eburon’s “Alpha & Beta” scene has been added to the Gallery (Tosk).

Act I-IV Features

Scene: A proper reunion with Cooch and Rhyll (collab with Demi Goggles and DoItToJulia).

Scene: Mina gets overexcitable if she is neglected as your consort (collab with Anon and DoItToJulia).

Fate: A followup to Maelys’s infernal fate (collab with Briar Bloodworth and DoItToJulia).

Fate: A followup to Marie-Anne’s wolfman fate (collab with Georgette Miller and DoItToJulia).

Fate: A followup to Mina’s mercenary fate (collab with Kiraworks and DoItToJulia).

Art: Remastered art for Eburon’s oral scene in the wolfcamp, and as your consort (four images, Lubbio).

Art: An alternate path for some of Naho’s consort scenes (eight images, Lubbio).

Art: Remastered art for Naho’s breaking (nine images, Lubbio).

Art: Remastered art for Naho’s broken anal scene (six images, Lubbio).

Art: Drunken Mina has a sobering experience (five images, Lubbio).

Art: Remastered art for Naho’s cowgirl scenes (three scenes, seven images, Lubbio).

Art: Remastered art for Naho’s doggy-style scenes (three scenes, twelve images, Lubbio).

Art: Remastered art for Naho’s various subjugations by the pack (four scenes, five images, Lubbio).

Art: A new main sprite for Naho’s wild state (Irrelevant Art).

Art: A new main sprite for Naho’s captive state (Irrelevant Art).

Art: Remastered emotes for Naho’s wild and captive states (twenty-five images, Irrelevant Art).

Art: Remastered sprites and emotes for Naho’s broken state (twenty-seven images, Irrelevant Art).

Art: Remastered sprites and emotes for Naho’s draconic transformation (twenty-seven images, Irrelevant Art).

Art: Remastered sprites and emotes for Naho’s plush transformation (twenty-seven images, Irrelevant Art).

Art: Remastered sprites and emotes for Naho’s statue transformations (nine images, Irrelevant Art).

Art: A torn-clothing sprite for Marie-Anne, in her mercenary fate (Irrelevant Art).

Animation: Animated idles for Boof (six animations, Amon Ra).

Animation: Updated talking animated idles for Chanwe (five variants, Amon Ra).

Animation: Updated idles for Chia (six variants, Amon Ra).

Animation: Updated angry animated idles for Enid (three variants, Amon Ra).

Animation: Updated idles for Inej (eight variants, Amon Ra).

Animation: Updated idles for Sabetha, dressed and undressed (twenty-one variants, Amon Ra).

Voice: Darja’s part in the conclusion to her scene with Cuchilla (Nyah).

Voice: Darja’s first visit to see Maelys (Nyah).

Voice: A number of retakes for the dragon’s lines (GreyScale).

Voice: Enid’s parts in your initial encounter with her (three variants, Demi Goggles).

Voice: The kobolds’ part in Heloise’s kobold fate (Kobold34).

Voice: The kobolds’ reaction to being gifted Maelys (Kobold34).

Voice: The kobolds’ part in Malagar’s naga blood experiment (Kobold34).

Voice: The kobolds’ part in fetching Marie-Anne’s things (Kobold34).

Voice: The kobolds’ part in Valzira’s kobold fate (Kobold34).

Voice: The kobolds’ cheer for you, if their Morale is high (Kobold34).

Music: The lowlands suite has been completely remastered, and considerably extended (Exo Spectra).

Music: Valzira now also has her own suite, which can be heard during her initial encounter (Exo Spectra).

Gallery: Naho’s Gallery entries have been updated to use preview sprites from her remastered scenes.

Gallery: Mina’s “Liquid Assets” scene has been added to the Gallery (Tosk).

Tweaks

The game’s official-ish walkthrough is now included in its root directory, whilst we look for a more permanent home for it.

Naho no longer wears clothes after her capture.

Background flags have been added to remember, in new playthroughs, whether you have given oral to a given waifu before.

Writing credits have been updated.

Fixes

Adeline won’t comment on Hector’s court appearance if she is dead or imprisoned.

Cooch will put her clothes back on after you join her in the bath.

If your consort was an elf, the conversation with Malice about human consorts will not play.

Malagar cannot liberate Darja from you in Act V if he was never encountered in your playthrough.

Marie-Anne will get redressed after her promotion to consort.

Mercenary visits will not softlock previously-seen fate scenes if a new fate scene is pending, but is disallowed by your content flags.

Mina will get redressed after her promotion to consort, and after having a bath.

Mina will not show up to court in Act V if she has been (decisively) eaten by a cute widdle abomination.

Petruk will now perish if stabbed in the chest by Maelys. People die if they are killed.

A niche sequence of events can no longer result in both elves being pregnant at the same time.

And everything found during playtesting. Thank you to our playtesters Stuke, Teddybear355, and Barry!

Win/Linux/Mac: GOFILE – MEGA – MIXDROP – PIXELDRAIN – WDHO

[Ren’Py] [Silac] My World Isekai [v0.0.69]

Release Date: 2024-07-07

Developer: Silac – Patreon – Itch.io – Twitter – Discord

Censored: No

Version: 0.0.69

OS: Windows, Mac, Linux

Language: English

Overview:

You play as Anon, the typical nerd salaryman on his late twenties.

Meet and romance various female characters.

Harem you say? You bet.

But keep in mind that not every one is an adept of sharing lover. Be wary of the ones whose jealousy may be expressed in… a virulent manner.​

v0.0.69

– Dynamic NPCs behaviour

They will sleep and interact with each other. They can technically do everything the player can do, meaning going to work and buy stuffs. But I’ll develop that in the next updates.

-Added a bit of Anna route writing

Win/Linux: GOFILE – GDRIVE – MEGA – MIXDROP – YOURFILESTORE

Mac: GOFILE – GDRIVE – MEGA – MIXDROP – YOURFILESTORE

[Ren’Py] [Whimfu1] Inc House [v0.06a]

Release Date: 2024-07-06

Developer: Whimfu1 – Blogspot

Censored: No

Version: 0.06a

OS: Windows, Linux, Mac

Language: English

Overview:

While performing an ancient ritual, Lincoln inadvertently becomes possessed by a sex demon that is slowly draining his life force unless he is able to seduce his fashionable crush, Leni. However, his new found powers also begin to affect his other roommates: British Punk Luna and his Affectionate Landlord Rita. Now he must find a way to rid himself of the Succubi’s curse while not hurting the ones around him in the process.​

v0.06a

Work Loop Screen new option added: Go to Bar. (This option is currently linked to Luna’s love level to help previous save files. However in the future it will be linked to a typical flag. Using code will automatically solve this issue.)

New Dialogue at Department Store/Mall.

Ability to revisit the changing room removed after all puzzles are solved. I hope to add this minigame back in once it’s fleshed out beyond the puzzles.

New menu when following Thiccqt. Includes new H-scene and ability to revisit previous scenes.

New submenu inside Lola’s Magic Mirror. Includes new H-scene and ability to revisit previous scenes.

New Bar Location added to the game. Includes the start of Luna’s bar storyline and Ms. DiMartino’s storyline.

Ms. DiMartino’s H-scene is available at the end of v0.06a current end to the bar storyline. Can be revisited after completion by returning to the bar location.

Bug fix – Adjusted anger rate when girls are aware in the shower minigame.

Bug fix – Lincoln layers under the heroine when contact is opened during the intro.

Bug fix – Two Lincoln’s on screen when scramble puzzle solved

Bug fix – Lola’s first scene took the player into negative lust if too low. Temporarily removed lust reduction as the power system reworked.

Minor Dialogue changes and fixes

Win/Linux: GOFILE – KRAKENFILES – MEGA – MIXDROP – WORKUPLOAD

Mac: GOFILE – KRAKENFILES – MEGA – MIXDROP – WORKUPLOAD

[Unity] [GamesSafu] Just Futanari [v1.71]

Release Date: 2023-05-02

Developer: GamesSafu Itch.io

Censored: No

Version: 1.71

OS: Windows, Android

Language: English, Chinese, Japanese, Korean

Overview:

Enjoy yourself in a love hotel as a couple of futanari. Use adult toys on your partner or yourself. Each location has several scenes that you can switch between.​

Installation:

1. Extract and run.

2. If you are using MetaQuest 2, please install “Futanari.apk” to your PC by using SideQuest.

v1.71

Improved menu opening during scene switching

Adjusted the Fade script.

Adjusted Jacuzzi sound

Adjusted the wheezing sound

Added a button to disable voice

Added sound when user enters online

Changed exhale from OFF to ON at the start of the game

Fixed a bug that caused the screen to go dark when pressing Profile in Setting in Menu during a scene

Fixed a bug that sometimes the opponent’s facial expressions did not engage at the beginning and end of a scene during online game

[VN] [Appetite] Perverted Affair With a Part-Time Working Housewife ～ A Turning Point For a Doujinshi Author Who Can’t Sell～[Final]

Release Date: 2018-10-12

Original Title: パート主婦との倒錯不倫～売れない同人作家の一大転機～

Aliases: Part Shufu to no Tousaku Furin ~Urenai Doujin Sakka no Ichidaitenki~

Developer: Appetite DLsite

Translator: AnimeMonolith – Patreon

Censored: Yes (Mosaic)

Version: Final

OS: Windows

Language: English (Edited MTL)

Voices: Japanese

Length: Short (~3 hours)

VNDB: Link

Store: DLsite

Overview:

Kamata Tomo is a doujinshi author who also works as a part-timer at the local convenience store to pay for his living expenses.

His inability to depict realistic sex scenes in his manga and the criticism he receives for it is making him depressed…

But how could he write realistic sex scenes when he has never experienced sex not even once in his entire life.

One day while going home from an after-work drinking party, he is invited by Moribuchi Ayaka, a married woman.

Moribuchi Ayaka wants to have sex, so they walk into a hotel.

Turns out, Moribuchi Ayaka is into hardcore sex.​

Translator’s Notes:

Full save included.

Cracked .exe could show up in virus scan, this is a false positive, there is nothing I can do about it.

Win: GOFILE – KRAKENFILES – MEGA – PIXELDRAIN – WORKUPLOAD

[RPGM] [Poison] World Break [Final]

Release Date: 2011-10-10

Developer: Poison Dlsite – Ci-en

Translator: hentify~

Censored: Yes (Mosaics)

Version: Final

OS: Windows

Language: English (GPT-4)

Store: Dlsite

Overview:

The protagonist Lucifer is exiled from the heavens for getting up to all sorts of mischief.

You swear vengeance on those who ousted you and decide to dominate the human world as your first step along the way!

This work is the same kind of r*pe themed genre as our previous work “person of courage.”

This time we have placed more emphasis on the erotic events than the story itself.

The main kinds of violation are g*ngbangs, interspecies sex, and tentacle r*pe.​

1. Install RPG Maker VX Run Time Package

2. To avoid “missing” file errors, before you extract using, on Winrar go to options > name encoding > select Japanese shift JIS

3. Extract and run.

[Unity] [Bunny Eats Tiger] Colony City 27λ [1.1.0]

Release Date: 2024-06-14

Developer: Bunny Eats Tiger Steam – Facebook

Publisher: Playmeow Steam – Discord – Website – Facebook

Censored: No

Version: 1.1.0

OS: Windows

Language: English, Japanese, Chinese, Korean

Store: Steam

Overview::

Colony City 27λ is an adult Rougelite game that combines simple card and complax skill set. In the story, there are plenty of challenging malevolent criminals, tentacle creatures, and mechanical enemies. Your battle performance during the adventure will determine the final ending!​

Developer Notes:

◆ Chaotic Era of Space Colonization

The Universal Security Bureau is the official institution maintaining cosmic order. Investigator Youzi, in pursuit of team achievements and to aid her captain boyfriend, ventures away from Earth to undertake perilous missions alone.

◆ Rich battle contents and battle sex scenes

In the chaotic space colony, there are three major types of enemies: humans, tentacles, and machines. Each of the 36 types of enemies has its own unique battle sex scenes (some actions are duplicated).

◇Choose from random skills to build your ideal command card deck. There are hundreds of skills waiting for you to unlock.

◇Ripping clothing, bondage, and forced intercourse—make good use of these mechanisms to find the possibility of victory in adversity!

◆ The inevitable path of corruption…?

In the face of the violations from various enemies and the training of malicious businessmen, can Youzi hold on to her feelings for her boyfriend?

◇Sex of defeat on the different stages will increase the heroine’s corruption value.

◇6 types of endings, each containing cockhold elements!

◆ Review mode outside the main storyline

Including: plot recap, free battle, and battle sex replay modes.

Change Language:

v1.1.0

Thank you for your enthusiastic support, to reward the players for the love of “Colony City 27λ”, Playmeow Games and the producer worked together to add a beautiful voice for Youzi.v1.0.5

1.Fixed a bug where mechanical enemies that don’t ejaculate could have semen.

2.Enemy Value Adjustment – Improves attack behaviour, reduces attack power during Restraint and Insertion.

3.Increase Enemy Stamina – While in Restraint and Insertion, the enemy will receive a damage reduction buff.

4.New Mechanism – Enemy H-Behaviour in battle can be selected to continue or break.

5.Adjusted the use of words related to ‘damage’ and ‘strength’.

Win: GOFILE – KRAKENFILES – MEGA – MIXDROP – WORKUPLOAD

[Unity] [Team Nimbus] Cloud Meadow [v0.2.1.1 Patreon]

Release Date: 2024-06-21

Developer: Team Nimbus Patreon

Censored: No

Version: 0.2.1.1 Patreon

OS: Windows

Language: English

Overview:

Cloud Meadow is a hybrid farming sim dungeon crawler, where the player can choose the solitude of a quiet sky high farm or the rushing adrenaline of a raging battle inside abandoned ruins, both of which benefit one another. Experience thrilling turn based combat versus a variety of enemies, using your own raised monsters, allies and an array of skills. Explore a huge variety of locations and hidden areas throughout the ever expansive world of Cloud Meadow. Among the three major towns the player will be able to fully navigate through it to discover quests, new npcs , stories and the lore behind the game. Farm to your hearts content and exchange your produce for goods and services, complete quests and raise your farms production! Breed and discover a large variety of monsters whom you can breed with one another AND breed with!​

v0.2.1.1 Patreon

Additions

Full overhaul for Tro’s Lab; a visual overhaul with updated backgrounds, cinematics, lore and general improvements

New optional quest; find & deactivate the poacher’s traps throughout the Savannah

Added character info & unlocking clues to locked sex scenes in the Album UI

Added audiovisual feedback after taking damage in an environmental hazard, such as acid

Fixes

Fixed Holstaur’s Counter headbutt being triggered by damage reflection

Fixed error when Yonten’s attack executes enemy unit Prism in boss fight

Fixed Garst’s This Is It ability not executing correctly at maximum skill rank

Fixed the player’s return point after the game over screen, when the had previously player fast travelled onto that floor

Fixed issue with lone Cat Stalker mob in Savannah F1 blocking 2 of the missing peasants

Valpongis (Equipment town merchant) should no longer be blocking access to Bilma the bread vendor

Minor Katarina station dialogue improvements

Added some missing character portraits to the Quest Log

Fixed error when the player returns via fast travel into the Katarina intro scene

Fixed Giev’s quest to upgrade the farm appearing when the farm is already at max level

Win: GOFILE – KRAKENFILES – MEGA – MIXDROP – WORKUPLOAD

[Unity] [Unifox Game Studio] Nymphomania: Idle Brothel [v1.4]

Release Date: 2024-07-05

Developer: Unifox Game Studio – Patreon – Subscribestar – Itch.io – Discord

Censored: No

Version: 1.4

OS: Windows, Mac, Linux, Android

Language: English

Overview:

Nymphomania: Iddle Brothel is a simple and addictive clicker.

Click and collect new scenes, accumulate prestige points and new characters will want to join your harem.

This game includes all the scenes already present in Nymphomania: Fantasy Town.

We want everyone to have access to it, which is why we decided to create this smaller and simpler game available on Android and WebGL.​

### CHANGELOG – 1.4 ###

Character

Orihime (Mom and Blood War)

Sex Scenes

From Behind

Variant added

Blowjob

Variant added

Cowgirl

New unique sex scene

Others

Girl can be previewed in the prestige tab

Girl tab doesn’t bug anymore if the prestige tab hasn’t been opened before

Game size reduced heavily

Error messages are now more explicit

Errors are less prone to lock your game on bug

In case of corrupted data, the game tries to reload as much as possible for the corrupted save file
